pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Super Simple Test Sequencer## Install```pip install super-simple-test-sequencer```## Create new test sequenceThis command creates new empty/template test sequence to test_definitions/ directory.```super_simple_test_runner.py ```Modify the template at test_definitions/ to create your own sequence.## Run sequence```super_simple_test_runner.py ```# More informationSee video of the concept (in finnish):https://youtu.be/x7MCSb7BLW4
